org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

Class DefaultInstanceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.DefaultInstanceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstanceManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalInstanceManager

    public class DefaultInstanceManager
extends Object
implements InstanceManager
    In Nephele an instance manager maintains the set of available compute resources. It is responsible for allocating new compute resources, provisioning available compute resources to the JobManager and keeping track of the availability of the utilized compute resources in order to report unexpected resource outages.
